Nothing comes close to the brilliance of the first Portal. This is as good a sequel as you could hope for though, and it's worth your time and money.

Super fun. So funny and the puzzles are a blast.
It is a pretty solid game, and I would say buy it if you want to have some enjoyable times bye yourself or with others.

This game is good to play in your free time, but if you play it online with your friends it gets better.
Now if you collect achievements, your almost completely screwed...
Portal 2 is like portal but good.
fun with a friend during quarantaine

Good puzzle game with coop mode

Очень интересная и местами забавная игра;что самое главное -не требовательная к характеристикам(да и вообще в игре нет больше 60 fps),атмосфера практически заставляет погрузиться *c головой* в сам геймплей (уровней много и немало-сложные,так что скучно не будет).Можно еще многое сказать,я-не критик;я говорю как обычный пользователь,прошедший данную игру.Ну решил написать этот комментарий-лишним не будет)
cooles puzzle spiel es ist zwar schon ein bisschen älter aber macht trotzdem richtig spaß.

Follows up the classic Portal with fun new puzzles and mechanics. This game is pretty old, but i still highly recommend it. The physics, puzzles, and challenges hold up really well. This is a game you truly have to experience for yourself, and there is nothing like it.
Oh.. it's you. Obviously brilliant. Obviously fantastic. Right up til the end of the credits. And now I only want you gone.
its more portal, so its good

Its funny and takes some thinking to play.

I reccomend it
Definitely worth playing if u have one friend, stupid enough to ply with you.

My favourite Valve original game <3 Awesome to play anyhow: challenging yourself, with friends, the hidden lore behind it, even the workshop is suberb! The impact of the Portal mechanic is a case to be studied on what a challenging game should aim to be!
5/5
très bon jeux les énigme devienne de plus en plus dure a chaque pièce difficulté hardcore. Mode 2 joueurs bonne idée ons se tape des barres tout le temps en 2 joueurs.
it is the greatest game valve has ever created

This game is amazing, the puzzles were perfect the storyline is great! and im lost for words when i finished this game

Když mi spadne internet, tak hra kterou hraji je Portal 2.

Mám rád puzzle offline hry s příběhem. Můj rekord dohrání hry bylo 5 hodin.
Příběh je nádherný, dojemný a trošku smutný. Pokud chcete hrát i multiplayer tak není problém, i ten zde naleznete.

Hru doporučuji! Určitě se vyplatí své peníze utratit právě zde.
pretty good thinking about this was realesed on 2011, i would recommend during quarentine if ur bored
Good game, can make or break a friendship :)

The story, environments, voice acting, and pretty much everything else is incredible. The developers clearly put so much heart into this game, it really shows. I love how in-depth it goes with the lore. Definitely one of my top 10 favorite games.
Классная игра сюжетка топ и кооп мы каждый день с братом играем И да игру я купил по скидке -80% на новый год
补交下当年没付的游戏钱，重温一下世界上最经典的3D益智解谜游戏，当年英语不好就全当一个益智过关类游戏玩了一遍，如今英语也好了，对游戏的看法也逐渐成熟，发现传送门世界的故事居然这么诡异深奥，真的是太棒了，唯一遗憾的就是有生之年估计不会再有传送门3了。。。

amazing graphics funny line expert puzzles 
lot of loading screens though

好玩，没玩过单人模式，但是和朋友玩通了双人。是一款非常严谨的解密游戏。
双人模式因为多了一个人，通关的操作更加复杂，更有想象力。
Игра очень пиздатая, для ксеров и дотеров не подойдёт, нужны друзья для ахуенного експиреанса. 9,5 турелей из 10

Possibly the greatest game ever made. Everyone MUST play this (after playing the first Portal) at least once in their life. Every puzzle is brilliantly made and finishing each one makes you feel like a genius. Also the way the ending... well just play the game
Play this hame is the best you can find friends and everything
Super gra mam nadzieję że powstanie następna część portala.
Хорошая графика и оптимизация неплоха. Совместимость в коопе с любым геймпадом: у меня китайский, и он работал идеально. Единственный минус - управление с геймпада не PS типа кривовато.
